home.acknowledgement: We would like to acknowledge the data and images we obtained from The Smart Local (TSL) when building the initial version of our app and assure that all current data in the listing are obtained with the consent from the originators themselves.
home.nowtoadd: now to add a listing for your favourite hawkers!

create.pleaseenter: Please enter more details regarding your stall listing.
create.placeholderbriefdescription: E.g. Best Chicken Rice in town
create.whichregion: Which regions do you deliver to? (Select Island-wide Delivery or NSEWC)
create.placeholderdeliverydetails: E.g. Only deliver to Bukit Batok for orders above $30
create.placeholderadditional: e.g. For a limited time, buy 3 get 1 free and islandwide delivery
create.placeholdercondition: e.g. any order / above $20 order size
create.previewdescription: This is how your listing will look like to users:
create.notsatisfied: Not satisfied? Just change the fields!
create.uploadimagedescription: Upload images of your listed hawker stall below
create.uploadmenu: If available, please upload your menu

about.para_one: is an easy-to-use web application designed to bridge hawker stalls and restaurant owners in Singapore with all Singaporeans via a free online platform.

search.prompt: Search by Name, Category, Food, Items e.g. Chicken Rice
